original_text: When the Israelite people heard this law, they sent away all the people who had foreign ancestors.
korean_text: 백성이 이 율법을 듣고 곧 섞인 무리를 이스라엘 가운데에서 모두 분리하였느니라

sentences.original_text: When the Israelite people heard this law
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 백성이 이 율법을 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: they sent away all the people
